Present location: INSTITUT DE PAPYROLOGIE ET D'ÉGYPTOLOGIE, UNIVERSITÉ DE LILLE III [02/049] LILLE
Name: Shabti of king Taharqa
Description: A mummiform shabti of King Taharqa. The image holds the royal insignia, is coiffed with the XXX, is protected by the uraeus, and wears a false beard. This white shabti bears an inscription as well as the royal cartouche.
